EmailTemplate.subject: Win a LEGO STAR WARS Jabba's Palace | Exclusive for Higher Ed IT Pros Webinar | Register to Win
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A VMTurbo Webinar Invitation Best Practices for Smarter Virtualization Management: VMTurbo As An IT Control System in Higher Education REGISTER TODAY <http://bit.ly/StbU6p>
WHAT Webinar, followed by a LEGOTM Star WarsTM Raffle
WHEN Wednesday, May 14, 2014, 11 am PDT / 2 pm EDT / 7 pm GMT FEATURING Dan Germain, VP Customer Success, VMTurbo Justin Kutticherry, Education Solutions Director, VMTurbo
At the core of every educational institution is an IT organization which powers and enables leadership and innovation. You are the enabler. What is running at your core?
Join us next Wednesday, May 14th at 2 pm EDT for a special VMTurbo webinar just for Higher Education IT Pros. We will discuss the four most common virtual infrastructure issues tackled by education IT Pros, who must scale and maintain their environments in support of thousands of users.
- Storage Control - Accurate Capacity Planning - Automating Healthy Operations - Deploying VDI
All webinar registrants will be entered to win a LEGOTM Star WarsTM Jabba's PalaceTM - you vote and decide! Register Now <http://bit.ly/StbU6p> Downloads White Papers Products 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
